description: Gets information about a Device Advisor test suite. Requires permission to access the GetSuiteDefinition action.

parameters.name: suiteDefinitionId
parameters.description: Suite definition ID of the test suite to get.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionId
nested_items.description: Suite definition ID of the suite definition.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the suite definition.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionVersion
nested_items.description: Suite definition version of the suite definition.

nested_items.name: latestVersion
nested_items.description: Latest suite definition version of the suite definition.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Suite configuration of the suite definition.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionName
nested_items.description: Gets the suite definition name. This is a required parameter.

nested_items.name: intendedForQualification
nested_items.description: Gets the tests intended for qualification in a suite.

nested_items.name: isLongDurationTest
nested_items.description: Verifies if the test suite is a long duration test.

nested_items.name: rootGroup
nested_items.description: Gets the test suite root group. This is a required parameter. For updating or creating the latest qualification suite, if intendedForQualification is set to true, rootGroup can be an empty string. If intendedForQualification is false, rootGroup cannot be an empty string. If rootGroup is empty, and intendedForQualification is set to true, all the qualification tests are included, and the configuration is default.

nested_items.name: devicePermissionRoleArn
nested_items.description: Gets the device permission ARN. This is a required parameter.

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: Sets the MQTT protocol that is configured in the suite definition.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: when the suite definition was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: when the suite definition was last modified.
